detailsData.title: Global Reach
detailsData.content: We are a local boutique firm with a global reach, working with clients across the world, including Latin America, Asia, and Europe, providing a unique perspective on international legal matters.

detailsData.title: Cost Efficiency
detailsData.content: Our services are offered at a fraction of the cost of Big Law, ensuring that startups and impact businesses receive high-quality legal support without breaking the bank.

detailsData.title: Startup Expertise
detailsData.content: With over 700 startups served and $700M+ in deals supported, our team has the experience and knowledge to guide venture-scale startups through their unique legal challenges.

detailsData.title: Comprehensive Services
detailsData.content: From formation and corporate governance to IP protection and funding, we offer a wide range of legal services tailored to the needs of startups and environmental and social impact businesses.

valueProp: We help founders build amazing companies - your legal partner from seed to exit. Navigate Your Legal Journey with practical and sound legal advice, a personalized approach, and a commitment to helping you achieve your growth goals.
